Description.Text:
Property Location
A stay at Hotel Lyon-ouest places you in the heart of Lyon, convenient to Ile Barbe and Tete d'Or Park. This hotel is within close proximity of Maison des Canuts and Place de la Croix Rousse.

Rooms
Stay in one of 102 guestrooms featuring LCD televisions. Complimentary wireless Internet access keeps you connected, and satellite programming is available for your entertainment. Bathrooms have complimentary toiletries and hair dryers. Conveniences include phones, as well as safes and desks.

Rec, Spa, Premium Amenities
Enjoy the recreation opportunities such as a fitness center or make use of other amenities including complimentary wireless Internet access.

Dining
Enjoy a satisfying meal at a restaurant serving guests of Hotel Lyon-ouest.

Business, Other Amenities
Featured amenities include complimentary newspapers in the lobby, a 24-hour front desk, and multilingual staff. Planning an event in Lyon? This hotel has facilities measuring 484 square feet (45 square meters), including meeting rooms. Self parking (subject to charges) is available onsite.


Pets allowed Check-in time starts at 3 PM Check-out time is noon
Enjoy a satisfying meal at a restaurant serving guests of Hotel Lyon-ouest.
Extra-person charges may apply and vary depending on hotel policy.
Government-issued photo identification and a credit card or cash deposit are required at check-in for incidental charges.
Special requests are subject to availability upon check-in and may incur additional charges. Special requests cannot be guaranteed.

Enjoy the recreation opportunities such as a fitness center or make use of other amenities including complimentary wireless Internet access.
Stay in one of 102 guestrooms featuring LCD televisions. Complimentary wireless Internet access keeps you connected, and satellite programming is available for your entertainment. Bathrooms have complimentary toiletries and hair dryers. Conveniences include phones, as well as safes and desks.

A stay at Hotel Lyon-ouest places you in the heart of Lyon, convenient to Ile Barbe and Tete d'Or Park. This hotel is within close proximity of Maison des Canuts and Place de la Croix Rousse.
Distances are calculated in a straight line from the property's location to the point of interest or attraction, and may not reflect actual travel distance.

Distances are displayed to the nearest 0.1 mile and kilometer.

Ile Barbe - 1.6 km / 1 mi
Maison des Canuts - 1.9 km / 1.2 mi
Place de la Croix Rousse - 2 km / 1.2 mi
Tete d'Or Park - 2.6 km / 1.6 mi
Interpol Headquarters - 2.7 km / 1.7 mi
Quai de Bondy Vaporetto Stop - 2.7 km / 1.7 mi
Terreaux Square - 2.7 km / 1.7 mi
Lyon Museum of Fine Arts - 2.7 km / 1.7 mi
Guignol Theater - 2.7 km / 1.7 mi
Lyon City Hall - 2.8 km / 1.7 mi
Metallic Tower - 2.8 km / 1.7 mi
Lyon Opera - 2.8 km / 1.7 mi
Musee d'Art Contemporain - 2.9 km / 1.8 mi
Lyon History Museum - 2.9 km / 1.8 mi
Notre Dame Basilica - 2.9 km / 1.8 mi

The nearest airports are:
Lyon (XYD-Part-Dieu SNCF Train Station) - 4.6 km / 2.9 mi
Lyon (LYN-Lyon Bron) - 11.9 km / 7.4 mi
Lyon (LYS-Saint-Exupery) - 21.4 km / 13.3 mi

The preferred airport for Hotel Lyon-ouest is Lyon (LYS-Saint-Exupery).

You must present a photo ID when checking in. Your credit card is charged at the time you book. Bed type and smoking preferences are not guaranteed.Your reservation is prepaid and is guaranteed for late arrival. The total charge includes all room charges and taxes, as well as fees for access and booking. Any incidental charges such as parking, phone calls, and room service will be handled directly between you and the property.

Extra-person charges may apply and vary depending on hotel policy.
Government-issued photo identification and a credit card or cash deposit are required at check-in for incidental charges.
Special requests are subject to availability upon check-in and may incur additional charges. Special requests cannot be guaranteed.
